title: Computer freezing sometimes while opening LoL or going into champion select
body: On these few new patches I´ve been having problems with the client, my computer freezes sometimes while opening or going into champselect, it even froze randomly while I was playng a custom game. I have a decent computer and it never freezes in other games such as Fallout 4 or Skyrim. This has led me to believe it is a problem with the client and it sucks to manually restart my computer every time this happens, since i can´t do anything while its frozen (no ctrl+alt+del or alt+f4) only mouse moves. Time doesn´t fix it either. Thanks for the help in advance!

replies.body: Right click the shortcut, click properties, then set it to compatibility mode for windows 7.
I've been having the same problem! It only happens to me on champ select though, and I have lost A LOT of lp from it. I can't say the constant 30 minute wait for games is fun either </3
